definitions.definition: The profession or art of devising , granting and blazoning coats of arms , tracing genealogies and ruling on questions of protocol or rank .
examples: Rouge Dragon Pursuivant is a specialist in heraldry at the College of Arms.

definitions.definition: An armorial ensign along with its history and description .

examples: Onlookers were impressed by the rich and colorful heraldry .

main_definition: ( uncountable ) The profession or art of devising , granting and blazoning coats of arms , tracing genealogies and ruling on questions of protocol or rank .
secondary_definitions: ( countable ) An armorial ensign along with its history and description .
